Your Investment Profile

Terms & Acknowledgments

Please review and acknowledge the following terms that govern our relationship and the services provided by Crown & Oak Capital.

Advisory Relationship Disclosure

Crown & Oak Capital operates exclusively as an independent private investment advisory firm. We facilitate connections between qualified investors and property owners but do not act as a licensed broker-dealer, real estate broker, or agent in any transaction. Our role is strictly limited to providing introductory services, investment intelligence, and transaction facilitation.

Due Diligence Responsibilities

While Crown & Oak Capital strives to present accurate information about investment opportunities, all investors are solely responsible for conducting independent due diligence on any potential transaction. We do not guarantee the accuracy or completeness of any information provided and make no representations regarding investment performance, property conditions, or transaction outcomes.

Limitation of Liability

In no event shall Crown & Oak Capital, its partners, directors, officers, employees, or affiliates be liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, special, exemplary, or consequential damages arising from your use of our services or any investment decisions made based on information provided through our platform.

Legal Acknowledgments

By submitting, you agree to receive SMS messages from Crown & Oak Capital Advisors. Message frequency may vary. Message & data rates may apply. Text HELP for help. Reply STOP to opt out. See our Privacy Policy and SMS Terms.

All information is treated with absolute confidentiality. Upon submission, a Crown & Oak Capital advisor will contact you within 24 hours to confirm receipt and discuss potential opportunities. By submitting, you acknowledge our confidentiality protocols and privacy policy.
